sentences.english: This putrid body disintegrates; life, indeed, ends in death.
sentences.chinese: 当这恶臭的污秽体分解时，生命真的结束于死亡。

sentences.english: China is as big, smelly and filthy as I remember it being as a young man traveling abroad.
sentences.chinese: 中国和我年轻时记忆中一样的巨大，发臭和污秽不堪。

sentences.english: Circumcise therefore the foreskin of your heart, and be no longer stubborn.
sentences.chinese: 所以你们要将心里的污秽除掉，不可再硬著颈项。

sentences.english: Thus were they defiled with their own works, and went a whoring with their own inventions.
sentences.chinese: 这样，他们被自己所做的污秽了，在行为上犯了邪淫。

sentences.english: Yet you have a few people in Sardis who have not soiled their clothes.
sentences.chinese: 然而在撒狄你还有几名是未曾污秽自己衣服的。

sentences.english: He wants you to think God sees you as dirty, filthy with sin.
sentences.chinese: 牠希望你以为神因你的罪过，而看你为污秽不堪。

sentences.english: Meat that touches anything ceremonially unclean must not be eaten; it must be burned up.
sentences.chinese: 挨了污秽物的肉就不可吃，要用火焚烧。

sentences.english: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart; and they defile the man.
sentences.chinese: 惟独出口的，是从心里发出来的，这才污秽人。

sentences.english: But they set their abominations in the house, which is called by my name, to defile it.
sentences.chinese: 竟把可憎之物设立在称为我名下的殿中，污秽了这殿。

sentences.english: Who can bring a clean thing out of an unclean?
sentences.chinese: 谁能使洁净之物出于污秽之中呢。

sentences.english: those who are pure in their own eyes and yet are not cleansed of their filth;
sentences.chinese: 有一宗人，自以为清洁，却没有洗去自己的污秽。

sentences.english: Do ye not perceive, that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man, it cannot defile him;
sentences.chinese: 岂不晓得凡从外面进入的，不能污秽人。

sentences.english: And the flesh that toucheth any unclean thing shall not be eaten;
sentences.chinese: 挨了污秽物的肉就不可吃，要用火焚烧。

sentences.english: When a woman has her regular flow of blood, the impurity of her monthly period will last seven days, and anyone who touches her will be unclean till evening.
sentences.chinese: 女人行经，必污秽七天，凡摸她的，必不洁净到晚上。

sentences.english: Mangy camelsrange, nuzzling the denuded tops of trees.
sentences.chinese: 污秽的骆驼四处游荡，用鼻子蹭着裸露的树梢。

sentences.english: All the tables are covered with vomit and there is not a spot without filth.
sentences.chinese: 因为各席上满了呕吐的污秽，无一处干净。

definition: to pollute (often fig.)/to be infected by/to gain a small advantage
